Well, David the spirit tech says that "black man, Troy Davis did not  shot 
the cop," and I guess that he was killed anyway If the fates  allow, I'm 
going to try to gather together some files in a little while  regarding this if 
anyone is interested and hopefully they will be heard.   btw, the fella did 
get in the light.  sf
